name: Only One Road
content: I'm looking back through the years
在人生道路上的所有回忆
And many dreams lost along the way
When love was too much to bear
当爱得太深，难以承受时
But here I stand face to face
没有你的日子，我无法前进
We had a love most people never find
我们曾拥有大多数人都找不到的爱情
All this time I never realized
And the courage I finally found
Only one lifetime one heart to guide me
生命只有一次，我只有一颗心为我指引方向
Cause I need you right here
我还能听到你如歌的笑声
我还能尝到你泪水中的忧愁
我们说了再见，但我们的心却没有告别
现在，我的爱人，我无所畏惧
With all my heart put me through
It leads me back to you
Only one lifetime one heart to guide me
只有一次生命，一颗心引导我
Cause I need you right here
Only one lifetime one heart to guide me
只有一次生命，一颗心引导我
Cause baby I need you here beside me
因为宝贝，我需要你在我身边
Cause baby I need you here beside me
因为宝贝，我需要你在我身边
